name: -taskzen-
description: - `npm init -y` - `npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer vite` - `npx tailwindcss init -p` - create your own css file and keep the following code:   - `@tailwind base;`   - `@tailwind components;`   - `@tailwind utilities;` - `npm run start` - click the link: <http://localhost:5173/>
